name: org.ilovefreegle.iphone
description: Offer and request free items on your local Freegle reuse group
author: Chris Cant

cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can take a photo of an item to offer
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.MICROPHONE_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can say what you are looking for
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.PHOTOLIBRARY_ADD_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can send a photo of an item to offer
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can save a photo of an item to offer

cordova-plugin-x-socialsharing.PHOTO_LIBRARY_ADD_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app requires photo library access to function properly.
cordova-plugin-x-socialsharing.PHOTO_LIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app requires photo library access to function properly.
